keyMappings:
unmapAll
# fn key	

map <Tab> scrollToTop
map x scrollToBottom

# top key	

map h previousTab
map i nextTab
map th firstTab
map ti lastTab	
map tt createTab
map te removeTab
map ta restoreTab
map tl duplicateTab	
map t<Backspace> visitPreviousTab
map td moveTabToNewWindow
map ts moveTabLeft
map tw moveTabRight
map tn closeTabsOnLeft
map tk closeTabsOnRight
map tp closeOtherTabs

# home Key

map s scrollPageUp
map w scrollPageDown
map e scrollUp
map a scrollDown

# bottom key

map n LinkHints.activateMode
map l LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <Backspace> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab

map d LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map <c-l> LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map <c-d> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito

map <c-s> enterInsertMode
map <c-e> enterVisualMode
map E enterVisualLineMode
	
# top key?index off 	

map b Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map g Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

# home key?index off

map o Vomnibar.activate
map u Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map r focusInput
map c mainFrame
map <c-r> reload
		
# bottom key?index off 	

map m scrollLeft
map y scrollRight

map vv copyCurrentUrl
map vo openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map vr openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map vu goUp
map vc goToRoot
map f LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
		
# symbol/num row

map / enterFindMode
map 1 goPrevious
map 5  goNext
map ? showHelp
map = toggleViewSource

map ' goBack
map . goForward
map " goBack
map , goForward
searchEngines:
#w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
